## Welcome {.unnumbered}

During my research journey in graduate school (MS and Ph.D. in Applied Economics), I developed a deep interest in Econometrics, Price Analysis, and Statistical Learning. 
  This collection of essays showcases how I built my foundational knowledge and expanded my research focus. 
  Please enjoy this material and feel free to contact me at [jaeseok2@illinois.edu](mailto:jaeseok2@illinois.edu).
